moves.name: Gust
moves.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Psywave
moves.description: The target is attacked with an odd  psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.description: The target is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Synchronoise
moves.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitate.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.
